# Bourne. JSON Bourne.

`JSON.parse()` drop-in replacement with prototype poisoning protection

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/hapijs/bourne.svg?branch=v1-commercial)](https://travis-ci.org/hapijs/bourne)
